page.topic: How to Customize the Confirmation Message When Closing a Dirty Form

discussion.p: The following example code can be put on a form's CanExit event to replace the built-in confirmation message with a message of your own.

p.example:
dim q as n q = ui_msg_box("Notice","Are you sure you want to exit from this form without saving your data?",UI_YES_NO_CANCEL)
if q = ui_cancel_selected .or. q = ui_no_selected then cancel() else topparent.command("record_cancel") end if
